channel.title: How Do I Change the max combat level?
channel.description:
Ok, in my source (pk-forest, a phonescape and pimpscape based server) the max stat is 99 and combat is 185.
I know how to change the max stat, but i want to change the max combat from 185 to 126.
Post how to PLEASE!!!
